heisig_chinese_memo: Particularly troublesome teenagers are forced to do community service by using their outstretched hands to pick trash up off of the ground.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Particularly troublesome teenagers are forced to do community service by using their outstretched hands to pick trash up off of the ground.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " earth " to " and " sound. " Junk " can be used as "岌" to indicate danger. "Ji Yun. "Ji Yun": "Junk, dangerous. It's all in trouble." Such as "Mozi. Non-Confucianism": "Fu Shun just sees the old man, at this time the world is rubbish!" "Zhuangzi. "World": "Worthy rubbish is in the world!" Lu Deming's interpretation": "Junk, the book is made as a problem. Guo and Li Yun: It is dangerous."

"Garbage" is often used together later to mean dirty soil or junk thrown away. Such as the Southern Song Dynasty Wu Zimu "Meng Liang Lu. "River Boat": "There are even more ships carrying garbage and dirt, which are carried away in groups." The second episode of Han Bangqing's "Biography of Flowers on the Sea" in the Qing Dynasty: "I was hitting a garbage truck and came down. Several workers shoveled long-handled shovel The garbage was thrown into the car, and it fell down and spattered in all directions, splashing far." See " Garbage ".

"Trash" can mean worn-out. Such as Feng Menglong of the Ming Dynasty "Awakening the World Heng Yan. "Zheng Jiezhu's meritorious service": "That humanity: "I sin against you!" So he went to bring the trash turban, draped in torn clothes, exposed legs, bare feet, and left the inn, facing the wind and snow. , Walked to Zhang Yuan's outer house."
humanum_short_description_en: From " earth " to " and " sound. " Rubbish " means "岌", which means danger.
humanum_full_description:
從「土」，「及」聲。「圾」通作「岌」，表示危險。《集韻．緝韻》：「圾，危也。通作岌。」如《墨子．非儒下》：「夫舜見瞽叟就然，此時天下圾乎！」《莊子．天地》：「殆哉圾乎天下！」陸德明釋文》：「圾，本又作岌。郭、李云：危也。」

　　「垃圾」後來經常連用，表示髒土或扔掉的破爛東西。如南宋吳自牧《夢梁錄．河舟》：「更有載垃圾糞土之船，成群搬運而去。」清代韓邦慶《海上花列傳》第2回：「正碰著拉垃圾 的車子下來，幾個工人把長柄鐵鏟鏟了垃圾拋上車去，落下來四面飛灑，濺得遠遠的。」參見「垃」。

　　「搭圾」可表示破舊。如明代馮夢龍《醒世恒言．鄭節使立功神臂弓》：「那人道：『罪過你！』便去帶了那頂搭圾頭巾，身上披着破衣服，露着腿，赤着腳，離了客店，迎着風雪，走到張員外宅前。」
humanum_short_description: 從「土」，「及」聲。「圾」通「岌」，表示危險。

之处必有垃圾。本义是垃圾。

Мусор
Пиктофонетические символы.
Почва означает, что надписи на костях оракула подобны куче земли на земле, что означает, что мусор - это грязная земля или отброшенный хлам; и (дзи) означает, что везде должен быть мусор.
Первоначальный смысл - мусор.
[Мусор] Относится к грязной земле или выброшенному хламу: ~ коробка "подмести ~" очистить
